Name: Autoroll
Script: trace(2222222222222222222222222222222); if(self.hasstatus(~revert~)) { if(self.roll_jackpot <= 0) while(self.roll_jackpot <= 0){ inflictself(~cpushield~); robotroll(); } } else { robotroll(true); trace(1); }

Name: Stardust
Script: var randstatus = rand([CURSE[;]LOCK[;]FIRE[;]ICE[;]WEAKEN[;]SHOCK[;]POISON[;]VANISH]); if(randstatus == ~vanish~) { inflict(~fade~); } else { inflict(randstatus); }

Name: Overload
Script: if(target.status.length > 0) { for(x in target.status) { if(x.type.split(~~).length > 4) { if(x.type.substr(0[;]5) == ~jinx_~) { continue; } } if(x.type != ~beartransform~ && x.type != ~extradamage~ && x.stacks) { inflict(x.type[;]x.value); } } } if(self.status.length > 0) { for(x in self.status) { if(x.type.split(~~).length > 4) { if(x.type.substr(0[;]5) == ~jinx_~) { continue; } } if(x.type != ~beartransform~ && x.type != ~extradamage~ && x.stacks) { inflictself(x.type[;]x.value); } } } sfx(~_thinghappens~);
